Description_lang: Maut transforms into an obsidian statue protected by a mana shield. While the shield lasts, Maut loses mana instead of health and inflicts $s1% of incoming damage back on attackers as Arcane damage.Depleting Maut's mana breaks the spell and interrupts $@spellname305722.
AuraDescription_lang: Shielded against damage, losing mana instead of health.Inflicting $s1% of incoming damage back on attackers.
